name: Website Uptime Monitoring with Visitors Count & Ranking V.2

value.Status: ={{ $json.Property ? (   $json.Suspended ? "SUSPENDED" :   $json.Compromised ? "COMPROMISED" :   $json["WordPress Error"] ? "WORDPRESS ERROR" :   $json["Website Error"] ? "WEBSITE ERROR" :   $json["Whitescreen Death"] ? "WHITESCREEN DEATH" :   ($json["DOWN_FROM_UP"] || $json["DOWN_FROM_DOWN"] ? "DOWN" : "UP") ) : undefined }}

parameters.subject:
={{ "Website: " + $('Calculate Status').item.json.Property + " is " + 
  ($('Calculate Status').item.json.Suspended ? "SUSPENDED" : 
   $('Calculate Status').item.json.Compromised ? "COMPROMISED" :
   $('Calculate Status').item.json["WordPress Error"] ? "WORDPRESS ERROR" :
   $('Calculate Status').item.json["Website Error"] ? "WEBSITE ERROR" :
   $('Calculate Status').item.json["Whitescreen Death"] ? "WHITESCREEN DEATH" :
   ($('Calculate Status').item.json["DOWN_FROM_UP"] || $('Calculate Status').item.json["DOWN_FROM_DOWN"] ? "DOWN" : "UP")) }}
=Website Monitoring Report | {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString("en-US", { year: "numeric", month: "long", day: "numeric" }) }}
=Website Monitoring Report | {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString("en-US", { year: "numeric", month: "long", day: "numeric" }) }}
